summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Genesee Street to West Charlestown Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9132 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
